about.title: About me
about.p1: I am a Computer Science Engineer with hands-on experience in DevOps, automation and Linux environments. I enjoy working on platforms where reliability, observability and continuous improvement are key.
about.p2: I have contributed to projects ranging from business process automation with Python, to deployment management in Azure and OpenShift, and the operation of on-premise pre-production environments. I feel comfortable working in English and I am especially interested in joining teams based in Denmark.
about.cardTitle: How I can add value to your team
about.cardItem1: Operation and monitoring of Linux infrastructures in critical environments.
about.cardItem2: Design of CI/CD pipelines and automation of repetitive tasks using Python.
about.cardItem3: Clear communication, documentation and collaboration with distributed teams.

experience.title: Experience
experience.job1Desc: Administration of on-premise pre-production and production environments based on Linux (RHEL), ensuring availability and stability of critical services. Designed and implemented a monitoring platform with Checkmk from scratch, currently supervising more than 30 environments.
experience.job2Desc: Worked on a project focused on managing deployments to Azure and OpenShift environments. Built infrastructure as code with ARM templates, defined build and release pipelines and troubleshooted CI/CD deployment issues.
experience.job3Place: IBM Chile · Python & Azure Boards project
experience.job3Desc: Developed a solution to automate ticket synchronization between the client's ITSM platform and Azure Boards, using object-oriented Python and SOLID principles, integrating several APIs and handling errors and logging robustly.
